title: Definitions
context: B. State Low-Income Housing; Liens [ยง356D-51] Definitions. As used in this subpart, unless a different meaning clearly appears from the context: &ldquo;State low-income housing project&rdquo; means any state low-income housing project or projects owned, managed, administered, or operated by the authority. &ldquo;Tenant&rdquo; includes any person occupying a room, dwelling unit, living quarters, or space in any state low-income housing project, under or by virtue of any tenancy lease, license, or permit under or from the authority. [L 2006, c 180, pt of ยง2]
